title: League client constantly crashing
body: This problem started for me as of I think patch 6.12, after a while of my client being active it would give me a popup saying LoL-Client.exe has crashed, Lol-Client would not turn white it would just say it has crashed  and im forced to click close. I just lost LP because of this

replies.body: This sounds like a corrupt game file, and could be resolved by [repairing the client.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq6)  If that doesn't resolve the issue, please reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
